result.title: Algorithm Tutorials
result.content:
Hi all,

Once or twice a month, I will be starting to write about an algorithm. I will pick a topic that is a recurring theme in a coding competition and write about it with links to problems that make use of the algorithm. Examples include, but not limited to, binary indexed tree, z-algorithm, union-find, and etc.

The idea for this blog entry is a food for thought. Once we fill the gap in our knowledge by solving problems, there is no doubt that this collection of entries would help us in the future contests.

In each regular meeting, I will get a suggestion for a topic to write about. By the end of the year 2015, we will definitely cover all the topics in here and beyond! So, stay tuned!!

Let's make this group the "best" training group in CodeForces :D

Thanks!

yongwhan
